page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Chesterfield town centre is situated 23 miles north of{Derby}and 12 miles south of{Sheffield.}From its{Roman origins the town has grown into a {Borough}with{96,000}inhabitants. Its famous landmark is the Parish Church with its{crooked spire.}It has been a thriving market town since medieval times. Industries have existed around the town for centuries, particularly those concerning{coal, pottery, {chemicals and iron and steel.}Sporting events are one of the town's favourite pastimes with facilities for all major pursuits. Over{30}public recreation grounds surround the town, with the beautiful{Queen's Park}the most noticeable. Chesterfield boasts its own{Civic Theatre}along with night clubs and restaurants. A massive {restoration programme}is in progress giving the town a facelift.
